member.summary: Input to the model for a prediction

member.summary: Input to the model for a prediction

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Input.InputData.CsvInstance
member.summary: A list of input features, these can be strings or doubles.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.Id
member.summary: The unique name for the predictive model.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.Kind
member.summary: What kind of resource this is.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.OutputLabel
member.summary: The most likely class [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.OutputMulti
member.summary: A list of classes with their estimated probabilities [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.OutputValue
member.summary: The estimated regression value [Regression models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.SelfLink
member.summary: A URL to re-request this resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.OutputMultiData.Label
member.summary: The class label.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Output.OutputMultiData.Score
member.summary: The probability of the class.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.Id
member.summary: The unique name for the predictive model.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.Kind
member.summary: What kind of resource this is.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfo
member.summary: Model metadata.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.SelfLink
member.summary: A URL to re-request this resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.TrainingStatus
member.summary: The current status of the training job. This can be one of following: RUNNING; DONE; ERROR; ERROR: TRAINING JOB NOT FOUND

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.Utility
member.summary: A class weighting function, which allows the importance weights for classes to be specified [Categorical models only].

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData
member.summary: Model metadata.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ClassWeightedAccuracy
member.summary: Estimated accuracy of model taking utility weights into account [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ClassificationAccuracy
member.summary: A number between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100% accurate. This is an estimate, based on the amount and quality of the training data, of the estimated prediction accuracy. You can use this is a guide to decide whether the results are accurate enough for your needs. This estimate will be more reliable if your real input data is similar to your training data [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ConfusionMatrix
member.summary: An output confusion matrix. This shows an estimate for how this model will do in predictions. This is first indexed by the true class label. For each true class label, this provides a pair {predicted_label, count}, where count is the estimated number of times the model will predict the predicted label given the true label [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ConfusionMatrixRowTotals
member.summary: A list of the confusion matrix row totals

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.MeanSquaredError
member.summary: An estimated mean squared error. The can be used to measure the quality of the predicted model [Regression models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ModelType
member.summary: Type of predictive model (CLASSIFICATION or REGRESSION)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.NumberClasses
member.summary: Number of classes in the trained model [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.NumberInstances
member.summary: Number of valid data instances used in the trained model.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ConfusionMatrixData
member.summary: An output confusion matrix. This shows an estimate for how this model will do in predictions. This is first indexed by the true class label. For each true class label, this provides a pair {predicted_label, count}, where count is the estimated number of times the model will predict the predicted label given the true label [Categorical models only].

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ConfusionMatrixData.ConfusionMatrixDataSchema
member.summary: The true class label.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ConfusionMatrixRowTotalsData
member.summary: A list of the confusion matrix row totals

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_3.Data.Training.UtilityData
member.summary: Class label (string).

member.summary: The true class label of this instance

member.summary: The input features for this instance
